an4.89:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthiko hoti, sammasankappo hoti, sammavaco hoti, sammakammanto hoti, sammaajivo hoti, sammavayamo hoti, sammasati hoti, sammasamadhi hoti.
an4.89:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanamacalo hoti.
an4.89:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthiko hoti, sammasankappo hoti, sammavaco hoti, sammakammanto hoti, sammaajivo hoti, sammavayamo hoti, sammasati hoti, sammasamadhi hoti, sammanani hoti, sammavimutti hoti, no ca kho attha vimokkhe kayena phusitva viharati.
an4.89:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanapundariko hoti.
an4.89:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthiko hoti …pe… sammavimutti hoti, attha ca vimokkhe kayena phusitva viharati.
an4.89:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samanapadumo hoti.
an4.89:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo samanesu samanasukhumalo hoti?
an4.89:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yacitova bahulam civaram paribhunjati, appam ayacito …pe… yanhi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya samanesu samanasukhumaloti, mameva tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya samanesu samanasukhumaloti.
an4.89:5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
